name: 語言學概論（二）
restrict: ◎限大二修習◎必須先修過【ENU0259  語言學概論（一）】
description: 這是一門兩學期的課程，目的有二：一是介紹給學生現代語言學的重要學理概念和實證發現，另一是讓學生熟悉語言學習的正確方法。課程涵蓋的主題包含：音韻學、形態學、句法學、語義學、語言變化以及語言學與其他學科之間的相互關係等，並以英語、漢語和其他語言的語料作為跨語言差異之範例。此外，本課程亦提供學生相關練習，提升學習成效。
goals: to familiarize the students enrolled with the fundamental concepts and the basic skills required for doing linguistic analysis
the students will be better equipped both for more advanced linguistics courses and as a competent English teacher.
syllabus:
**Course description:**

    Thiscourse aims to familiarize the students enrolled with the fundamental conceptsof language and linguistics as well as the basic skills required for doinglinguistic analysis. It is hoped that with these concepts and skills thestudents will be better equipped both for more advanced linguistics courses andas competent language teachers/learners.

**Textbook:**

_An Introductionto Language_ (10th edition), by Victoria Fromkin, Robert Rodman & Nina Hyams

**Requirements and Evaluation**:

Quizzes(and assignments)  30%

Exams   60%    

Attendance& Participation  10%

**Bonus points(at most 5 points):**

1.  Participate in a 2-hour workshop or conference, take notes, and **hand-write** a 200-word report to express your own opinions to get one bonus point. If the workshop/conference is 4 hours long, you should write a 400-word report to get 2 bonus points.
2.  Participate in a 2-hour talk or listen to an on-line talk on linguistics, take notes, and **hand-write** a 200-word report to express your own opinions to get one bonus point. 

**Other Requirements:**

**a.**     All the assignments must behanded in on time. Late submission will not be accepted.

**b.**    Attendance is required. If youcan’t come to a class, you must let me know in advance; otherwise, it will **cost you two  points from  your final grade**.If you are absent in case of uncontrollable situations (e.g. illness, etc.), besure to give me the valid proof withintwo weeks. **If you are absent for five times or more, you are not qualified to earn the credits.**
